# relbert/flan-t5-small-analogy-nell

This is [google/flan-t5-small](https://huggingface.co/google/flan-t5-small) fine-tuned on [relbert/nell_relational_similarity](https://huggingface.co/datasets/relbert/nell_relational_similarity) 
for analogy generation, which is to generate a word pair (eg. `bird is to crow`) given a query (eg. `mammal is to whale`) 
so that the query and the generated word pair form an analogy statement.  

### Usage

```python
from transformers import pipeline

pipe = pipeline('text2text-generation', model="relbert/flan-t5-small-analogy-nell")
output = pipe("generate analogy: mammal is to whale")
print(output)
>>> [{'generated_text': 'bird is to crow'}]
```
